name: Ro-Conga Two-part Trilogy
description:
As the sole itch.io account holder in the team I've uploaded this here.

For #kiwijam16

Credits:

  • Rlan - robot and human art, title screen design
  • Sami - Roconga 1 code
  • Shanky - background tile art
  • Ben - Roconga 2 code, audio, bullet art

Roconga 1 was made using Stencyl.

Roconga 2 was made in a hurry using Löve2D.

None of us have ever used Stencyl, nor Löve2D, and we are not experienced pixel artists.
